Cristiano Ronaldo has tested positive for the coronavirus.

The Juventus star has been released by the Portugal national team and is now unable to face Sweden.

Portugal's FPF said:" Cristiano Ronaldo was released from the work of the National Team after a positive test for COVID-19, so he will not face Sweden."
